account.delete-desc: Here you can delete your account including all associated data:
account.delete-confirm: Are you sure, that you want to delete your account including all associated data?
account.delete-success: Your Account and all associated data has been deleted successfully!
account.delete-error: Your Account could not be deleted. Please try again later.
account.change-password-desc: Here you can change your password:
account.change-password-success: Your Password has been changed successfully!

postList.nothingHere: Nothing here yet. Go ahead and add your first Blog!

addBlogDialog.specifyBlogUrl: Please specify the URL of the new Blog below.
addBlogDialog.blogUrlNotSupported: The specified Blog URL is not supported. Please contact our support for help
addBlogDialog.blogAlreadyAdded: You have already added this Blog URL. Please check your Blogs

authentication.request-password: Please enter your email address to request a password reset.
authentication.verification-email-sent: We have sent a verification email! Please check your inbox.
authentication.confirmation-email-sent: We have sent a confirmation email to {{email}}. Please check your email and click on the link to verfiy your email address.
authentication.confirmation-email-resent: Success! Confirmation Email has been resend.
authentication.nothing-here: Hmm, there is nothing for you to see here.

cookie.message: This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website.

auth.invalid-email: The email address is badly formatted.
auth.wrong-password: Wrong combination of Email and Password.
auth.too-many-requests: Access to this account has been temporarily disabled due to unusual activity. You can immediately restore it by resetting your password or you can try again later.
auth.uid-already-exists: The provided user identifier is already in use by an existing user. Each user must have a unique identifier.
auth.invalid-password: The provided password is invalid. It has to contain at least six characters.
auth.credential-already-in-use: This credential is already associated with a different user account.
auth.requires-recent-login: This operation is sensitive and requires recent authentication. Sign in again before retrying this request.
auth.email-change-needs-verification: Multi-factor users must always have a verified email.
auth.email-already-in-use: This email address is already in use by another account.
auth.cancelled-popup-request: This operation has been cancelled due to another conflicting popup being opened.
auth.account-exists-with-different-credential: An account already exists with the same email address but different sign-in credentials. Sign in using a provider associated with this email address.
auth.network-request-failed: A network error has occurred. Please try again later.
auth.popup-blocked: Unable to establish a connection with the popup. It may have been blocked by the browser.
auth.popup-closed-by-user: The popup has been closed by the user before finalizing the operation.
auth.provider-already-linked: User can only be linked to one identity for the given provider.
auth.redirect-cancelled-by-user: The redirect operation has been cancelled by the user before finalizing.
auth.redirect-operation-pending: A redirect sign-in operation is already pending.
auth.second-factor-already-in-use: The second factor is already enrolled on this account.
auth.maximum-second-factor-count-exceeded: The maximum allowed number of second factors on this user has been exceeded.
auth.user-token-expired: Your credentials are no longer valid. Please sign in again.
auth.unsupported-first-factor: Enrolling a second factor or signing in with a multi-factor account requires sign-in with a supported first factor.
auth.unsupported-persistence-type: The current environment does not support the specified persistence type.
auth.unsupported-tenant-operation: This operation is not supported in a multi-tenant context.
auth.unverified-email: This operation requires a verified email.
auth.user-cancelled: You did not grant this app the permissions it requested.
auth.user-not-found: There is no user record corresponding to this identifier. The user may have been deleted.
auth.user-disabled: Your account has been disabled by an administrator.
auth.weak-password: Your password must contain at least 6 characters.
auth.web-storage-unsupported: This browser is not supported or 3rd party cookies and data may be disabled.
